SmartFieldSpec.Name: Constituent Lifetime Average Gift Amount without Mission and Vision Trips
SmartFieldSpec.Description: Constituent Lifetime - Mission and Vision Trip registrations are excluded
SmartFieldSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SmartFieldSpec.DisplayName: Constituent lifetime average gift amount without mission and vision trip registration payments
SmartFieldSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SMARTFIELD_LIFETIMEAVERAGEGIFTWITHOUTMISSIONANDVISIONTRIPS ( @ASOF datetime ) as -- write sql to calculate the smart field values based on the parameters and ASOF date begin
with NewRevenueAmounts as ( select r.ID, r.LOOKUPID, r.AMOUNT, r.DATE, r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE, r.TRANSACTIONTYPE, sum(rs.AMOUNT) as NEWAMOUNT
from dbo.REVENUE r join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on r.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.DESIGNATION d on rs.DESIGNATIONID = d.ID
where (d.VANITYNAME like 'M-%' or d.VANITYNAME like 'V-%') and d.VANITYNAME <> 'M-9001' and d.VANITYNAME <> 'M-0004' and d.VANITYNAME <> 'M-0005' and d.VANITYNAME <> 'M-0006'
group by r.ID, r.LOOKUPID, r.AMOUNT, r.DATE, r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE, r.TRANSACTIONTYPE ), ConstituentRevenueCount as ( select r.CONSTITUENTID, count (distinct r.ID) RevenueCount from revenue r left join NewRevenueAmounts ra on r.ID = ra.ID where r.AMOUNT - coalesce (NEWAMOUNT, 0) > 0 and r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE = 0 -- PAYMENT group by r.CONSTITUENTID ),
ConstituentRevenueTotal as ( select r.CONSTITUENTID, sum(r.AMOUNT - coalesce (NEWAMOUNT, 0)) as RevenueTotal from revenue r left join NewRevenueAmounts ra on r.ID = ra.ID where r.AMOUNT - coalesce (NEWAMOUNT, 0) > 0 and r.TRANSACTIONTYPECODE = 0 -- PAYMENT group by r.CONSTITUENTID )
select c.ID, case when coalesce(rcount.RevenueCount, 0) = 0 then 0 when rtotal.RevenueTotal is null then 0 else rtotal.RevenueTotal / rcount.RevenueCount end as AverageGiftAmount from dbo.CONSTITUENT c left join ConstituentRevenueCount rcount on rcount.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID left join ConstituentRevenueTotal rtotal on rtotal.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID
end
